materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of the Shwedagon Pagoda in Rangoon, Burma. The pagoda is seen in the distance, in the background of the photograph. In the foreground, there is a road surrounded by vegetation, with a lake on the right. There is a horse-drawn carriage in the middle of the road, with several people accompanying it. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Shwedagon Pagoda, Rangoon
subject_terms_1: scenery (landscape) pagodas (buildings) Buddhism lakes (bodies of water) stupas
subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Rangoon (Burma) Rvhe ti gum? Ce ti? to? (Rangoon, Burma) Lakes Buddhism Stupas Pagodas
